mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.type AS "type", a.logo AS "logo", a.web_url AS "webUrl", a.name AS "name", a.address AS "address", a.descs AS "descs", a.contact AS "contact", a.contact_mobile AS "contactMobile", a.order_num AS "orderNum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN cms_activity b ON b.id = a.activity_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_activity_organization a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.activity_id LIKE '%'||#{activityId}||'%' '%'+#{activityId}+'%' concat('%',#{activityId},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_activity_organization( id, activity_id, type, logo, web_url, name, address, descs, contact, contact_mobile, order_num, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{activityId}, #{type}, #{logo}, #{webUrl}, #{name}, #{address}, #{descs}, #{contact}, #{contactMobile}, #{orderNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_activity_organization SET activity_id = #{activityId}, type = #{type}, logo = #{logo}, web_url = #{webUrl}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, descs = #{descs}, contact = #{contact}, contact_mobile = #{contactMobile}, order_num = #{orderNum}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
